name: Pilgrimage Demo
description:
A retro platformer where you travel along the inside of a cave. What will you find in the depths below?

Pilgrimage was the first game is a bunch of firsts for me as a game developer: Pilgrimage is the first game I have fully completed before abandoning because of scope, the first 48 "game jam"  game I have made (it was a personal game jam), and first time creating a full tileset for a project! I plan to revisit this game in the future because I have a a story to tell with it.
